name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Workday app for pc,windows and Mac (Free use)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Daily Employee Work Status Added By HR

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our "Workday app for Pc, Windows, and Mac" Simplify work management, create tasks, maintain schedules, and generate salary sheets effortlessly. Your ultimate HR assistant.


✅ Workday app Extension Features:

1) Workday app: You can create and maintain a work list for your workers. 

2) Below, beautifully write Task Title, Task Details, Start Date, and End Date. You can create a salary sheet. It works as an assistant to an HR.

3) Easy To use

4) Simple Extension

✅ How To Use Workday app on PC?

Step 1: Start by adding this extension to your Chrome browser by clicking "Add to Chrome."

Step 2: Next, click on the Extension icon.

Step 3: You will see three tabs:

"Employee Name"
"Employee Work Details"

Step 4: Then You have the ability to generate and manage a task list for your employees. Beneath, elegantly document Task Title, Task Details, Start Date, and End Date. Additionally, you can establish a salary sheet, serving as an aid to HR tasks.

Step 5: Enjoy a safer browsing experience!

✅ Disclaimer:

Please note that "Workday app for PC, Windows, and Mac" Chrome Extension is an independent product and is not associated, affiliated, or endorsed by the Workday app Android app or its developers. We respect intellectual property rights and make no claim to any copyrights associated with the Workday app Android app.
